marketplaces.name: claude-code-inhand
marketplaces.description: A curated collection of development plugins organized by scenario, covering backend, frontend, mobile, DevOps and database workflows.
marketplaces.repo_description: Claude Code in hand, everything at your fingertips.

files..claude-plugin/marketplace.json:
{
  "$schema": "https://anthropic.com/claude-code/marketplace.schema.json",
  "name": "claude-code-inhand",
  "description": "A curated collection of development plugins organized by scenario, covering backend, frontend, mobile, DevOps and database workflows.",
  "version": "2.0.0",
  "owner": {
    "name": "kimliss"
  },
  "categories": [
    "development",
    "backend",
    "frontend",
    "mobile",
    "devops",
    "database"
  ],
  "plugins": [
    {
      "name": "dev-toolkit",
      "source": "./plugins/dev-toolkit",
      "description": "General-purpose development toolkit with agents, contexts, skills, and hooks for enhanced Claude Code workflows.",
      "category": "development",
      "tags": ["agents", "code-review", "tdd", "security", "planning"]
    },
    {
      "name": "go-dev",
      "source": "./plugins/go-dev",
      "description": "Go development plugin with gopls LSP support, Go-specific agents, and project scaffolding.",
      "category": "backend",
      "tags": ["go", "golang", "gopls", "backend"]
    },
    {
      "name": "java-dev",
      "source": "./plugins/java-dev",
      "description": "Java/Spring development plugin with jdtls LSP support and Spring Boot patterns.",
      "category": "backend",
      "tags": ["java", "spring", "spring-boot", "jdtls", "maven", "gradle"]
    },
    {
      "name": "python-dev",
      "source": "./plugins/python-dev",
      "description": "Python development plugin with Pyright LSP support, Django/FastAPI patterns.",
      "category": "backend",
      "tags": ["python", "django", "fastapi", "flask", "pyright"]
    },
    {
      "name": "vue-dev",
      "source": "./plugins/vue-dev",
      "description": "Vue.js development plugin with Vue Language Server support and component patterns.",
      "category": "frontend",
      "tags": ["vue", "vuejs", "nuxt", "vite", "frontend"]
    },
    {
      "name": "react-dev",
      "source": "./plugins/react-dev",
      "description": "React/Next.js development plugin with component patterns and state management.",
      "category": "frontend",
      "tags": ["react", "nextjs", "typescript", "jsx", "frontend"]
    },
    {
      "name": "android-dev",
      "source": "./plugins/android-dev",
      "description": "Android development plugin with Kotlin/Jetpack Compose patterns.",
      "category": "mobile",
      "tags": ["android", "kotlin", "jetpack-compose", "mobile"]
    },
    {
      "name": "ios-dev",
      "source": "./plugins/ios-dev",
      "description": "iOS/Swift development plugin with sourcekit-lsp support and SwiftUI patterns.",
      "category": "mobile",
      "tags": ["ios", "swift", "swiftui", "xcode", "sourcekit-lsp"]
    },
    {
      "name": "flutter-dev",
      "source": "./plugins/flutter-dev",
      "description": "Flutter development plugin with Dart Language Server support and cross-platform patterns.",
      "category": "mobile",
      "tags": ["flutter", "dart", "cross-platform", "mobile"]
    },
    {
      "name": "devops-toolkit",
      "source": "./plugins/devops-toolkit",
      "description": "DevOps toolkit with CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes, and infrastructure-as-code patterns.",
      "category": "devops",
      "tags": ["devops", "docker", "kubernetes", "ci-cd", "terraform", "infrastructure"]
    },
    {
      "name": "database-toolkit",
      "source": "./plugins/database-toolkit",
      "description": "Database toolkit with schema design, query optimization, and migration patterns.",
      "category": "database",
      "tags": ["database", "sql", "postgresql", "mysql", "mongodb", "redis"]
    }
  ]
}
files.README.md:
# Claude Code Inhand **Claude Code in hand, everything at your fingertips.** A curated plugin marketplace for [Claude Code](https://docs.anthropic.com/en/docs/claude-code) — 11 plugins across 6 categories, covering the full development lifecycle. [![Plugins](https://img.shields.io/badge/plugins-11-blue)](plugins/) [![Categories](https://img.shields.io/badge/categories-6-green)](#plugin-catalog) [![License: GPL v3](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-GPLv3-blue.svg)](LICENSE) **English** | [简体中文](docs/zh-CN/README.md) [Getting Started](#getting-started) · [Plugin Catalog](#plugin-catalog) · [Contributing](#contributing)
--- ## Features - **Full-stack coverage** — Backend, frontend, mobile, DevOps, and database plugins - **LSP integration** — Built-in language server support for Go, Java, Python, Vue, Swift, Dart - **10 AI agents** — Planning, code review, TDD, security audit, architecture, and more - **3 context modes** — Dev, research, and review workflows - **Extensible** — Create your own plugins with the included template ## Getting Started ```bash # Add the marketplace claude plugin marketplace add kimliss/claude-code-inhand # Install any plugin claude plugin install dev-toolkit claude plugin install go-dev ``` ## Plugin Catalog ### Development | Plugin | Description | LSP | |--------|-------------|-----| | [dev-toolkit](plugins/dev-toolkit/) | General-purpose toolkit with 10 agents, 3 context modes, 4 skills | — | ### Backend | Plugin | Description | LSP | |--------|-------------|-----| | [go-dev](plugins/go-dev/) | Go development with project scaffolding | `gopls` | | [java-dev](plugins/java-dev/) | Java / Spring Boot development | `jdtls` | | [python-dev](plugins/python-dev/) | Python (Django / FastAPI) development | `Pyright` | ### Frontend | Plugin | Description | LSP | |--------|-------------|-----| | [vue-dev](plugins/vue-dev/) | Vue.js / Nuxt development | `Vue Language Server` | | [react-dev](plugins/react-dev/) | React / Next.js development | — | ### Mobile | Plugin | Description | LSP | |--------|-------------|-----| | [android-dev](plugins/android-dev/) | Android / Kotlin / Jetpack Compose | — | | [ios-dev](plugins/ios-dev/) | iOS / Swift / SwiftUI | `sourcekit-lsp` | | [flutter-dev](plugins/flutter-dev/) | Flutter / Dart cross-platform | `Dart Language Server` | ### DevOps | Plugin | Description | LSP | |--------|-------------|-----| | [devops-toolkit](plugins/devops-toolkit/) | CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform | — | ### Database | Plugin | Description | LSP | |--------|-------------|-----| | [database-toolkit](plugins/database-toolkit/) | Schema design, query optimization, migrations | — | ## dev-toolkit The core plugin that powers your daily workflow. | Component | Details | |-----------|---------| | **Agents** | `planner` · `code-reviewer` · `tdd-guide` · `security-reviewer` · `architect` · `build-error-resolver` · `e2e-runner` · `refactor-cleaner` · `doc-updater` · `database-reviewer` | | **Contexts** | `dev` — rapid implementation · `research` — exploration & learning · `review` — code quality & security | | **Skills** | `iterative-retrieval` · `backend-patterns` · `frontend-patterns` · `explain-code` | ## Project Structure ``` claude-plugins-inhand/ ├── .claude-plugin/ │ └── marketplace.json # Plugin registry (11 plugins) ├── plugins/ # All plugins │ ├── dev-toolkit/ │ ├── go-dev/ │ ├── java-dev/ │ ├── python-dev/ │ ├── vue-dev/ │ ├── react-dev/ │ ├── android-dev/ │ ├── ios-dev/ │ ├── flutter-dev/ │ ├── devops-toolkit/ │ └── database-toolkit/ ├── external_plugins/ # External plugin references (reserved) └── templates/ # Plugin development template ``` ## Contributing ```bash # Create a new plugin from template cp -r templates/plugin-template plugins/your-plugin ``` See [CONTRIBUTING.md](templates/CONTRIBUTING.md) for the full guide. ## License This project is licensed under the [GNU General Public License v3.0](LICENSE).
